summary: Dr. Jekyll faces horrible consequences when he lets his dark side run wild with a potion that transforms him into the animalistic Mr. Hyde.
cast: Fredric March|Miriam Hopkins|Rose Hobart|Holmes Herbert|Halliwell Hobbes|Edgar Norton|Tempe Pigott|Robert Adair|Leonard Carey|Frank Goddard|Pat Harmon|Sam Harris|Boyd Irwin|Tom London|Arnold Lucy|Murdock MacQuarrie|Eric Mayne|G.L. McDonnell|John Rogers|Douglas Walton|Eric Wilton
title: El hombre y el monstruo
